segments.text: I think the kitchen looks ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring down the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is after the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is steady, but the stool wobbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently with open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is perfectly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between inside and out is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about slips on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes on the counter wait untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, tempting them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a scene of hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
